summary:
This mod currently adds six \"craftable\" arrows to the game that aim to
make the ultimate archers life, so much more appealing. 
These arrows will be found on enemies, random loot or you can just go and forge them yourself.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

This mod currently adds six \"craftable\" arrows to the game that aim to
make the ultimate archers life, so much more appealing. 
These arrows will be found on enemies, random loot or you can just go and forge them yourself.

Non-overpowered and lorefriendly arrows that will extend and be updated on a regular basis.
Enjoy!

[b]CURRENT ARROWS:[/b]
[b]Arrow of Love:[/b] Will calm any enemy apart from dragons
[b]Incendiary Arrow:[/b] Sets target on fire
[b]Limb Spike Arrow:[/b] Has a higher chance on crippling an enemy with great force
[b]Timebomb Arrow:[/b] Explodes 5 seconds after launch
[b]Torch Arrow:[/b] Lightens up dark places with sticky torches
[b]Proximity Arrow:[/b] Explodes when an enemy gets into it radius, meaning it\'s okay to slightly miss your targets
[b]Frost Tip Arrow:[/b] Makes your target slip.

[b]NOTE:[/b] Torch lights might glitch when a lot of torches have been fired.

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]Skype:[/b] Dyramisty
[b]Facebook:[/b] [url=http://www.facebook.com/ddeheer]Dylan de Heer[/url]

[b]Skyrim Nexus:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384870]Dyramisty[/url]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b] 
V1.0:
* Release

V1.9:
* Added custom textures
* Added one new arrow
* Fixed minor bugs
author: Dyramisty
